statements: SELECT * FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, date, heating_temp, cooling_temp FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT building_id, occupancy_time FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE heating_temp > 70 AND cooling_temp < 60;
SELECT * FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE cooling_temp IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date DESC, occupancy_time ASC;
SELECT AVG(heating_temp) AS avg_heating_temp, AVG(cooling_temp) AS avg_cooling_temp FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE building_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE building_id = 1 ORDER BY date DESC, occupancy_time ASC
SELECT building_id, heating_temp, cooling_temp FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE heating_temp > 70 AND cooling_temp < 65 ORDER BY date, occupancy_time
SELECT date, AVG(heating_temp) AS avg_heating_temp FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule GROUP BY date HAVING AVG(heating_temp) > 65 ORDER BY date
SELECT DISTINCT building_id FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule WHERE heating_temp > cooling_temp
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM HeatingCoolingSchedule
SELECT * FROM building_occupancy_data;
SELECT building_id, occupancy_status FROM building_occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT building_id, occupancy_start_time, occupancy_end_time FROM building_occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM temperature_schedule;
SELECT building_id, heating_start_time, cooling_start_time FROM temperature_schedule WHERE building_id = 'abcd-1234';
SELECT * FROM building_occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE;
SELECT building_id, occupancy_status FROM building_occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = FALSE;
SELECT building_id, occupancy_start_time, occupancy_end_time FROM building_occupancy_data ORDER BY occupancy_start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM temperature_schedule WHERE heating_start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00' AND building_id = '3f1234bc-d368-4a95-a1f7-486663dfb585';
SELECT building_id, heating_start_time, cooling_end_time FROM temperature_schedule WHERE cooling_start_time < heating_start_time ORDER BY heating_start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM Building WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyData ORDER BY occupancy_date DESC;
SELECT building_name, schedule_date, heating_temp FROM Building JOIN Schedule ON Building.building_id = Schedule.building_id;
SELECT * FROM Building WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT building_name, building_address FROM Building ORDER BY building_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyData WHERE occupancy_hours > 8;
SELECT building_name, schedule_date, heating_temp FROM Building JOIN Schedule ON Building.building_id = Schedule.building_id;
SELECT * FROM Schedule WHERE cooling_temp < heating_temp;
SELECT * FROM building_info
SELECT building_name, address, floor_area FROM building_info
SELECT building_id, building_name, address, floor_area FROM building_info WHERE floor_area > 500
SELECT building_name, address FROM building_info WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT * FROM heating_schedule WHERE temperature >= 70
SELECT * FROM occupancy_data WHERE occupancy_status = TRUE ORDER BY date DESC, time ASC
SELECT building_name, address, floor_area FROM building_info ORDER BY building_id
SELECT building_name, floor_area FROM building_info WHERE building_id = 1
SELECT schedule_date, temperature FROM heating_schedule WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY schedule_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cooling_schedule WHERE start_time >= '12:00' AND end_time <= '18:00' ORDER BY schedule_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, building_type FROM Building;
SELECT * FROM OccupancyData WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM HeatingSchedule ORDER BY heating_start_time DESC;
SELECT building_name, sensor_location FROM Building JOIN TemperatureSensors ON Building.building_id = TemperatureSensors.building_id;
SELECT * FROM Building ORDER BY building_id ASC, building_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT building_name, building_type FROM Building WHERE building_type = 'Office' ORDER BY building_name;

SELECT Building.building_id, TemperatureSensors.sensor_location FROM Building JOIN TemperatureSensors ON Building.building_id = TemperatureSensors.building_id WHERE TemperatureSensors.sensor_type = 'Thermometer';

SELECT B.building_name, OS.occupancy_date, HS.heating_start_time, CS.cooling_end_time FROM Building B JOIN OccupancyData OS ON B.building_id = OS.building_id LEFT JOIN HeatingSchedule HS ON OS.occupancy_id = HS.occupancy_id LEFT JOIN CoolingSchedule CS ON OS.occupancy_id = CS.occupancy_id ORDER BY OS.occupancy_date DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT building_type FROM Building WHERE building_id IN (SELECT building_id FROM OccupancyData) ORDER BY building_type DESC;
